tasks.label: Config: Encrypt (config.json -> config.enc)
args: read -s -p 'FP_CONFIG_PASS: ' FP_CONFIG_PASS; echo; FP_CONFIG_PASS="$FP_CONFIG_PASS" node tools/config-crypto.mjs enc data/config.json data/config.enc

tasks.label: Config: Decrypt (config.enc -> config.json)
args: read -s -p 'FP_CONFIG_PASS: ' FP_CONFIG_PASS; echo; FP_CONFIG_PASS="$FP_CONFIG_PASS" node tools/config-crypto.mjs dec data/config.enc data/config.json
